title: Ep. 66 Late Bloomer w/ Kevin Nealon - Where My Moms At w/ Christina P
description:
SPONSORS: - Discover the New Michelin® CrossClimate® 2 tires at MichelinMan.com. - Receive a free $20 gift card when you subscribe at SimplyEarth.com/wmma - Go to AdamAndEve.com and use code WMMA to get 50% off plus 10 free gifts! - Get 15% off your Brüush kit when you use promo code WMMA at bruush.com. - Go to PlushCare.com/wmma to start your FREE 30-day trial - To reserve your spot in a FREE class, go to VarsityTutors.com/wmma. - Head to Ancestry.com/WMMA to get your AncestryHealth kit today!

WHERE MY MOMS AT!? It's the show by the Moms for the Moms. Hosted by everybody's favorite "cool mom" Christina P! Not only the most REAL show for moms, but the most interactive. An open place to admit no one really knows what they're doing.

Kevin Nealon joins Christina P to discuss raising a child later in life, gender pronouns, his experience in Catholic school, cartoon crushes and more. Christina and him react to two very different kindergarten teachers: one woke, and one tattooed. They also read listener stories about mishaps driving with children.

Christina P. wants to hear from you since she is seriously lacking in cool mom friends. If you want to share a "Mom Fail" or "Mom Hack" please call into our voicemail (213)375-5184 and let Christina know! We want to talk to as many moms across America as we can.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
